duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance and training for nonprofit loan packagers in the USDA 502 Direct Loan Application Packaging.
Ensure that USDA 502 Direct loan files comply with programmatic and administrative regulations.
Electronically submit 502 files to USDA RD website.
Produce loan packages of quality and quantity that meet departmental goals.
Ensure compliance by RCAC and Qualified Employers as defined in signed Memorandum of Understandings.
Work closely with lending partners and agencies.
Provide technical assistance in homeownership program development.
Promote and facilitate partnerships to maximize resources, taking the lead with assigned partners.
Prepare activity and outcome reports as required.
Lead the Homeownership Program Team in implementing various program activities such as loan packager training and homeownership programs.
Work under the Homeownership Program Manager.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Housing Development, Affordable Mortgage Lending, or related field (Master's preferred)
Possession of a valid driver's license and proof of insurance
